title: Quiz 1 - Articles
instruction: In each of the questions given below a sentence is given with a blank. The sentence is then followed by four alternatives out of which one will fit the blank. Choose the alternative that will fit the blank most appropriately and make the sentence grammatically and contextually correct.

quiz.text: Ankit prefers (1) / self-employment (2) / to job (3) / in any office. (4) / No Error (5)
options: 1
2
3
4
5

quiz.text: Amar’s habit of (1) / delaying his work (2) / put his friends (3) / to lot of trouble. (4) / No Error (5)
options: 1
2
3
4
5

quiz.text: He is not (1) / rich so he (2) / cannot afford to buy (3) / a expensive house. (4) / No Error (5)
options: 1
2
3
4
5

options: 1
2
3
4
5

2

4
5

quiz.text: Q17) The majority of the computer professionals recommends (a) / that effective measure (b) / should be taken against software piracy (c) / No error (d)
options: a

quiz.text: Unfortunately, I had _______time to enjoy New York because I had to work so much.
options: a little
little
